title: Engraving, "Decorated capital letters A and B", 1715
description:
A: Letter "A" standing before God the Father who is talking to Adaom, behind whom Eve stands.  

B: Letter "B" standing before St. Bartholomew, who kneels, carrying knife and skin.

Framed by a moulding, as are all the letters up to -26.  Signed left bottom corner: "P. I."; and right bottom corner: "F.S."

tombstone.epitaph:
Engraving, "Decorated capital letters A and B", 1715.
1715. Overall: 4.6 x 6.1 cm (1 13/16 x 2 3/8 in.). Gift of Alice Donlevy. 1907-7-18-a.
